channel.title: Simple sprite sheet based 2d animation [src]
channel.description:
This is an example I wrote for someone who posted a help thread on here which uses a sprite sheet to animate an image, feel free to use. Source & binary are attached below.
image: [img]http://puu.sh/pdsz[/img]
Enjoy :)
[URL=http://up.ht/IY7Az2]2d-simple-animation.bin.jar - 60 KB[/URL] [URL=http://up.ht/IY7Azb]2d-simple-animation.src.jar - 57 KB[/URL]
